gametools

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • gametools.Area
      • gametools.Graphic
        • gametools.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mass

    public class Sprite
extends Graphic
    Used for adding movement and behavior for graphics.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Sprite.Direction
      The predefined directions the sprite can move in.
      static class  Sprite.Rotation
      The directions in which the sprite can rotate.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class gametools.Graphic

        Graphic.UpdateType

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class gametools.Area

        Area.Collision, Area.Corner

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gametools.Area

        UNDEFINED_AREA, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite()
      Creates a blank sprite without an image or position.
      Sprite(Animation animation)
      Creates a sprite in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom animation.
      Sprite(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Creates a sprite in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom image.
      Sprite(Graphic graphic)
      Creates a sprite and copies over all the properties from the graphic.
      Sprite(Position pos, Animation animation)
      Creates a sprite at the specified coordinates with a custom animation.
      Sprite(Position pos, java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Creates a sprite at the specified coordinates with a custom image.
      Sprite(Sprite sprite)
      Creates an exact copy of the passed in sprite.

        Creates a blank sprite without an image or position.

        Parameters:

        public Sprite(Animation animation)
        Creates a sprite in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom animation.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation for the sprite.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(Graphic graphic)
        Creates a sprite and copies over all the properties from the graphic.
        Parameters:
        graphic - The graphic to copy the properties from.

              java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)

        image - The image for the sprite.

        Creates an exact copy of the passed in sprite.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        Returns the amount the sprite moves each frame.
        Returns:
        The speed the sprite moves at.

      • getRotationSpeed

        public double getRotationSpeed()
        The amount the sprite rotates each frame.
        Returns:
        The rotation speed of the sprite.

      • getMovementArea

        public Area getMovementArea()
        Returns the area in which the sprite is allowed to move with the movement commands.
        Returns:
        The area in which the sprite is allowed to move within or the constant for an undefined area if none is currently set.

      • getRelationalMovement

        public boolean getRelationalMovement()
        Returns whether or not the sprite is moving using directions relative to its angle.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the sprite is using relational movement.

      • getScript

        public Script getScript()
        Returns the current script acting on the sprite or an undefined script if there is none.
        Returns:
        The script the sprite is using.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the speed the sprite will move at when using its move methods.
        Parameters:
        speed - The amount of pixels the sprite will move each frame.

      • setRotationSpeed

        public void setRotationSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the speed the sprite will rotate at. The default is ten.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed the sprite will rotate at.

      • setRelationalMovement

        public void setRelationalMovement(boolean relational)
        Turns on or off relational movement, where a sprite's directions are relational to where it is facing (its angle).
        Parameters:
        relational - True to turn relational movement on, false to turn it off.

      • script

        public void script(Script script)
        Sets a script for the sprite to use.
        Parameters:
        script - A script to run every time the sprite is updated.

      • removeScript

        public void removeScript()
        Removes the script the sprite is using if it has any.

      • lockMovementArea

        public void lockMovementArea(Area area)
        Defines the area the sprite can move inside. A sprite will not be able to go outside this area using the movement commands however the sprite can still get outside this area using the setters for its x and y.
        Parameters:
        area - The area inside which the sprite can move unrestrictedly.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(Position mid,
                   Sprite.Rotation rot)
        Rotates the sprite around the specified position at the sprite's speed.
        Parameters:
        mid - The position around which to rotate.
        rot - The direction to rotate in.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(Position mid,
                   double ang)
        Rotates the sprite around the specified position at the passed in amount.
        Parameters:
        mid - The position around which to rotate.
        ang - How far to rotate in radians.

      • face

        public void face(Area obj)
        Sets the angle of the sprite to face the center of the specified object.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object the sprite should face.

      • face

        public void face(Position pos)
        Sets the angle of the sprite to face the specified position.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position the sprite should face.

      • turn

        public void turn(Sprite.Rotation rot)
        Turns the sprite in the specified direction using the sprite's rotation speed.
        Parameters:
        rot - The rotation constant for the direction the sprite should turn in.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(Area obj)
        Turns the sprite until it faces the specified object.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object the sprite should turn towards.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(Position pos)
        Turns the sprite until it faces the specified position.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position the sprite should turn towards.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double ang)
        Turns the sprite until it reaches the specified angle.
        Parameters:
        ang - The angle the sprite should turn towards.

      • moveAt

        public void moveAt(double ang)
        Moves the sprite at the passed in angle at the set speed.
        Parameters:
        ang - A double of the angle in radians.

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(Position pos)
        Moves the sprite to the coordinates at the set speed.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position where the sprite should move to.

      • move

        public void move(Sprite.Direction dir,
                 double speed)
        Moves the sprite at one of the defined directions at a custom speed.
        Parameters:
        dir - The direction the sprite should move to.
        speed - The speed at which to move at.

      • move

        public void move(Sprite.Direction dir)
        Moves the sprite at one of the defined directions at the set speed.
        Parameters:
        dir - The direction the sprite should move to.
